content.question: Of the following students, who is most clearly demonstrating an internal attribution?

choices.label: Jane, who says she failed a test because her teacher hates her.
Martin, who says he earned a spot on the football team through his hard work.
Lyle, who says his team won the quiz bowl tournament because they got lucky.
Tyler, who says he lost the vote for class president because the election was rigged.

content.answer: Martin, who says he earned a spot on the football team through his hard work.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
